degrees.name: Master's Degree in Frontend Development and UX

projects.name: Optimization Seminar for Gene Network Reconstruction
projects.description: Attended a three-month seminar at the University of Málaga focused on optimization techniques for gene network reconstruction using metaheuristic approaches.

projects.name: Android Application Development for COPD Patients
projects.description: Participated in the development of an Android application designed to improve treatment adherence for patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) over a four-month period. The application was subsequently presented at the Andalusian Health Challenge.

projects.name: Educational Innovation Project in Biology and Omics Sciences
projects.description: Conducted a study on phylogenetic inference problems as part of a research project at the University of Málaga.

projects.name: Heatmap Generation Application
projects.description: Designed, developed, and maintained an application for generating heatmaps from gene expression data, enabling subsequent clinical analysis. This project originated from a research grant.

keyContributions: Led the migration of a legacy app to React while maintaining production releases, ensuring uninterrupted client service.
Implemented automated testing (unit, component, e2e), accelerating release cycles.
Acted as Frontend Tech Lead, making architectural decisions and mentoring junior developers.
Collaborated with product, UX/UI, and backend teams to deliver user-focused solutions.
Optimized performance and UI responsiveness, while applying frontend security best practices.
Developed real-time dashboards to monitor server status and ensure high-availability, handling large volumes of data for continuous updates.
Contributed to micro-frontend architecture using Webpack Module Federation.
Built scalable React applications with state management and routing, collaborating closely with design, QA, and product.
Built internal company tools using React (frontend) and Java/MySQL (backend).
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated releases.
Worked in a Big Data research team, developing internal tools with React, Java, and MongoDB.
Gained early experience in frontend development while completing degree studies

personalInfo.name: Alicia Fernández
personalInfo.description: Senior Frontend Developer with 9+ years of experience building scalable, high-quality web applications using React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Skilled in unit, component, and end-to-end testing (Jest, Vitest, Cypress, Playwright) and modern frontend tooling (Webpack, Vite, Parcel, Rspack). Experienced in working closely with product, UX/UI, and backend teams to deliver solutions that are not only technically solid but genuinely meet user needs, ensuring an optimal user experience.
